amendment.description: Amendment deleted language requiring that a toll be paid by owners of hybrid vehicles for use of car pool lanes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in part B of House Report 108-456 to strike a requirement in the bill that states must charge tolls if they want to allow drivers of gasoline-electric hybrid vehicles to use high occupancy vehicle (HOV) lanes even if the car does not meet occupancy requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
